list.abs: ...范即为正确（richtig）。言说理论的核心概念是理性判断（rationaler Urteil），所谓理性判断就是理性之立论（Begrundung）或理性 …
成都理工大学外国语学院 ... 课程改革 curriculum reform 课程理念 curriculum rationale 课程目标 curriculum goals.
泰勒提出的 「泰勒法则」 (Tyler rationale)，强调课程设计应遵循：决定教育目标、 选择教育经验、 组织教育经验、 评监达成情形等 …
business imperatives 需求answer rationales 题解metric 指标

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: modern Latin, neuter (used as a noun) of Latin rationalis 'endowed with reason' (see rational)

entry.tran: 基本理论；理论基础；合理性的根据
entry.def: The rationale for a course of action, practice, or belief is the set of reasons on which it is based.

example.ex: However, the rationale for such initiatives is not, of course, solely economic...
example.tran: 然而，这种提议的根据当然并不仅仅是经济方面的。

example.ex: The rationale of reprocessing spent nuclear fuel is inevitably being questioned.
example.tran: 对核废料进行再加工的理由不可避免地受到了质疑。

means.word_mean: 1. (law) an explanation of the fundamental reasons (especially an explanation of the working of some device in terms of laws of nature);
